name: Tonkin weasel
description: The Tonkin weasel or Vietnamese mountain weasel is a species of weasel from Vietnam. The species was described by Swedish biologist Berkil Bj√∂rkegren in 1941, from a single specimen obtained in Vietnam in 1939. It was classified as a subspecies of common weasel until 2007, when it was re-classified as a separate species. It is not classified in the IUCN Red List and is listed as data deficient.
